name: Eleven Goal 3D coloring book - painting soccer
name_original: Eleven Goal 3D coloring book - painting soccer
description:
Eleven Goal is a coloring book for soccer in which Mark Endo is ready to shoot the decisive goal in the final of the world cup. Help Mark Endo win Mamoru Evans. He shoots the penalty or foul and take his team, Raimon, to victory.
• Select the player you want to color
• Use the color palette
• Press the button and transform the character with his equipment with 3D effect
Have a great time in the world by painting this star sport, they will be able to paint drawings of goalkeeper or referee, kicking their favorite soccer players or professional athletes of the selection of football or soccer that will win the soccer. Color these soccer teams with boys and girls.
The possibilities are endless. You can also send the image that your child has colored to friends, family or anyone who wants. Will be very proud of their little work of art!
A learning game in which you will use your fingers like pencils or crayons with an infinite color palette. The image can be automatically colored and get a 3D animation.
